scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: One scrapbook created by Helen and Leo Blody titled "Veterans of the Abraham Lincoln Brigade: 50th Anniversary Commemoration of the Spanish Civil War, October 14-28, 1986. The scrapbook, which was dedicated to Canadian volunteer Rubin Ryant (killed in Spain), contains original photos, maps, and memorabilia of VALB's 1986 trip to Spain. It has a wooden binding and needs a custom box. Enclosed in the scrapbook were original Spanish Civil War letters written by Ryant to Helen and Leo.
